<p>For those who plan to destroy the KSC as their first act in <em>KSP: Economic Boom</em>, do it with style. Do it with <a href="http://bit.ly/1s3BMnp"><strong>PatPL</strong></a>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1s3BMnp"><strong>BOMBS</strong></a>. Just pick a bomb from a utility slot, attach it to a wing and fire away. There are a variety of bombs to choose for when you’re feeling a bit on the destructive side.</p>

<p>For more info and download links for Bombs, click <a href="http://bit.ly/1s3BMnp"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

To be fair though, military research helped launch the Space Age (V1, V2), and many of the first NASA astronauts had backgrounds in military aviation.
